ygData.subject: Re: Lullaby tip now Hymn stuff
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Does anyone know if Hymn stacks with a Shaman s regeneration buffs?  After playing both a bard and a shaman, I m thinking that I ll look up an appropriate
ygData.messageBody:
>From: David.Lynam@...
>
>>At some level your normal regeneration rate gets upgraded to 3
>>pts/tick (not quite sure when or if this is sitting), which
>>would put it at 19 pts/tick at L42. Sitting gives you an extra
>>1 pt/tick, for 20 pts/tick.
>
>Actually, sitting doubles your natural regen rate, as a troll regens 2 hp
>standing, 4 sitting. I was curious whether or not HP regeneration ever
>increased, this is good to know.
>


Does anyone know if Hymn stacks with a Shaman's regeneration
buffs? After playing both a bard and a shaman, I'm thinking that
I'll look up an appropriate level shaman with my bard. Might be an
interesting combo.

Tindayen, 16th level bard
Swifthawk, 7th level shaman
